 # [#ABOUT ABOUT]
 
= ABOUT =
[http://code.google.com/p/gprivacy/ gprivacy] is an add-on for [http://www.seamonkey-project.org/ SeaMonkey] and [http://www.mozilla.com/firefox/ Firefox], that make certain popular websites respect the browser's DNT (Do Not Track) flag.
